title: Amulet of nature

properties.name: description
properties.value: An amulet of nature is used to monitor the state of a Farming patch. It can only be bound to one patch at a time, and will remain bound until a different patch is used. To bind the amulet to a particular Farming patch use the amulet on the desired patch. If the state of the patch that the amulet is bound to changes and the amulet is worn, it will vibrate. This should allow the wearer to detect when the patch is diseased or fully grown. This feature will only show up if you're online at the time and one time when you log in, but you can also rub the amulet at any time to find out the current state of your patch.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Amulet of nature
Amulet of nature

MembersYes

Advanced data
Item ID6040

An amulet of nature is used to monitor the state of a Farming patch. It can only be bound to one patch at a time, and will remain bound until a different patch is used. To bind the amulet to a particular Farming patch use the amulet on the desired patch. If the state of the patch that the amulet is bound to changes and the amulet is worn, it will vibrate. This should allow the wearer to detect when the patch is diseased or fully grown. This feature will only show up if you're online at the time and one time when you log in, but you can also rub the amulet at any time to find out the current state of your patch.

You can only have 1 amulet of nature at a time and, once enchanted, it is untradeable. There is no limit to how many times you can rub the amulet and it can be used again after harvesting or clearing the patch it is bound to.

The amulet can display the following messages based on the state of your Farming patch:

I am afraid that your patch has succumbed to disease and died, my friend. I am truly sorry.

I am afraid that your patch has succumbed to disease, my friend. You must attend to it immediately, before it dies.

Your patch is growing nicely at the moment, free from disease.

Your patch has now grown to fruition, my friend.

An amulet of nature can be created by stringing an emerald amulet (u) with magic string to make a pre-nature amulet. Casting Lvl-2 Enchant on it will result in an amulet of nature.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 May 2019
(update | poll)

The amulet shows the growth state upon checking the patch. Additionally, a bug where the amulet did not bind to one of the twelve grape vine patches has been fixed.

17 January 2019
(update)

The amulet of nature gives its information in fewer chat boxes.

4 January 2018
(update)

Corrected grammar when checking a Nature Amulet that is tied to a Fossil Island hardwood patch.

[[File:Amulet of nature detail.png|left|100px]]
An '''amulet of nature''' is used to monitor the state of a [[Farming]] [[farming patch|patch]]. It can only be bound to one patch at a time, and will remain bound until a different patch is used. To bind the amulet to a particular Farming patch use the amulet on the desired patch. If the state of the patch that the amulet is bound to changes and the amulet is worn, it will vibrate. This should allow the wearer to detect when the patch is diseased or fully grown. This feature will only show up if you're online at the time and ''one'' time when you log in, but you can also rub the amulet at any time to find out the current state of your patch.

You can only have 1 amulet of nature at a time and, once enchanted, it is untradeable. There is no limit to how many times you can rub the amulet and it can be used again after harvesting or clearing the patch it is bound to.

The amulet can display the following messages based on the state of your Farming patch:

{{RSFont|I am afraid that your patch has succumbed to disease and died, my friend. I am truly sorry.}}

{{RSFont|I am afraid that your patch has succumbed to disease, my friend. You must attend to it immediately, before it dies.}}

{{RSFont|Your patch is growing nicely at the moment, free from disease.}}

{{RSFont|Your patch has now grown to fruition, my friend.}}

An amulet of nature can be created by stringing an [[emerald amulet (u)]] with [[magic string]] to make a [[pre-nature amulet]]. Casting [[Lvl-2 Enchant]] on it will result in an amulet of nature.
